items.content_html: Web3API is a WASM standard for integrating Web3 protocols into applications. This eliminates the need for client-side SDKs, making dApps lightweight and multi-platform.

items.content_html: MicroLib is a lightweight API framework built on Node.js that uses module federation to host and integrate multiple, independently deployable "microservice libraries" running in the same process, with a view toward eliminating or ameliorating the well-known tradeoff between deployment independence and operational complexity.
items.title: module-federation/MicroLib: MicroLib is a lightweight API framework built on Node.js that uses module federation to host and integrate multiple, independently deployable "microservice libraries" running in the same process, with a view toward eliminating or ameliorating the well-known tradeoff between deployment independence and operational complexity.
